Articles.Content:
So I have something ya'll might like...

It uses the mod adjustable landing gear, I could make it stock but im too lazy to make stock landing gear work.

Linky Link: [https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/321/Adjustable%20Landing%20Gear](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/321/Adjustable%20Landing%20Gear)

The Boatercycle!

It's a pontoon boat, that goes over 160m/s on water, can be beached, and has a good amount of fuel.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/XA3hs)

Download: [http://www./download/54s009yywmz398c/%5BHalco%5D+Le+Boatercycle.craft](http://www./download/54s009yywmz398c/%5BHalco%5D+Le+Boatercycle.craft)
